column4: I ask this question in a Linux IRC Channel because Windows users are useless:  What is the best spyware detector for windows?
antyspyware and spybot are not ... good, they are pigs :D
consider it a compliment that I have to come to linux channel to get an answer to a windows question
this is not the chat channel
or did you not know about it? its part of the netbook distro
chatting is not for this channel; you are asking about hardware
which is completely related to ubuntu as there are ubuntu distributions for specific hardware platforms
how do I get php working?
stay nice and you can remain
compiling all of that is not the ubuntu way
please stop with the enter key.
